text: Update on @sommely on instagram. I successfully received a note from someone at IG asking for proof that Sommely is something that belongs to us. I sent them the Domain Name Registration form, which has my email address listed as contact in the WHOIS. Fingers crossed.
Will ping Shashi today about wine procurement. My friends Nicole and Greg might stop by mid-morning to check it out.
time for stand up!

Just got pulled into a meeting...
Update from me is that power management is working great. Left a cap on battery overnight and it's working like a champ.
Some work to do today to add deeper sleep states, but it's looking good.
Pinged Shashi about checking the board design, and he said they're on it. Had to pass that review before it heads to Screaming Circuits
Question I have - on the Sommely website, could we pull the extra Intel logos?
and replace the placeholder video w/ Grant’s video?
oof
